content:
For the results section of a digital asset management portfolio project focused on the creation of an EDM song, you could highlight the following:

* A description of the final product, including audio clips or samples of the finished song
* Statistics or metrics on the time and effort saved by using digital asset management techniques
* Any challenges or obstacles faced during the process, and how you overcame them using your digital asset management skills
* Evidence of the effectiveness of your approach in terms of organization, efficiency, and creative outcomes
* Feedback from collaborators or listeners on the quality of the final product and your contribution to the project.
